Caption: Dr. P. C. Varghese addresses the audience
Description: Seated on the dais from left: Mr. C. V. Sethunathan (Registrar), Prof. N. Klein, a gentleman (yet to be identified), Prof. B. Sengupto (Director), Sardar Ujjal Singh(Governor of Madras, and chief guest), Mrs. Ujjal Singh, Prof. S. Sampath and Mr. Thomas Victor (General Secretary). According to the 1967 April edition of Campastimes, “Prof. Varghese welcomed the gathering. It was his last speech as the President of the Gymkhana.”
